data.title: Reading And Writing Podcast
data.meta_description: Interviews with authors about their books, their writing habits, their favorite novels, and how they got started writing.
data.text:
Interview with John McNally, author of the crime novel THE PINNED BUTTERFLY, published under the pen name Johnny Mack.

You can support the podcast today by buying me a coffee, or you can subscribe to the podcast via Apple iTunes for ad-free episodes.

Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/reading-and-writing-podcast/donations
